alert.note: Alert for Far Northeast Highlands; Harding County; Northeast Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 03 at 2:54AM MST until January 05 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM THURSDAY TO 6 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 5 inches. * WHERE...Far Northeast Highlands, Harding County, and Northeast Highlands. * WHEN...From 5 AM Thursday to 6 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Tire traction will be reduced. Extend the distance between your vehicle and the vehicle in front of you. This includes along portions of I-25 from Raton toward Glorieta Pass.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Far Northeast Highlands; Harding County; Northeast Highlands
